name: Floofa's Revengence
description:
Play as the adorable Floofa who is on a quest to retrieve the

honey stolen by the maleficent bears from...her? Him? IT?

Whatever, the point is to go kick some butt unless you cannot bear the scary

foes on your path. Jump, double jump and shoot your way through

an unbearable mess until you achieve complete and total victory.

Nothing stops Floofa!!

Theme: Foofaraw
Every little thing you do triggers an noisy crazy achievement meaning that every little thing counts!

Update 1.1:

  • Edited last stage
  • Movie Visual added
  • Minor text edits
  • Visual components added
  • Re balancing of enemies
